about_the_game:
Maestro VR - Level Editor is the perfect addition to Maestro VR, allowing you to create and customize your own virtual symphony orchestra and design rhythmic levels within the game.

  • Create Your Virtual Symphony Orchestra: Edit each instrument track by track, assigning them audio files that will be placed in the 3D space corresponding to each musician. Mix your orchestra's audio to experience a unique musical journey. Each concert hall has its own reverberation, adding realism and depth to your performances.

  • Synchronize Animations with Your Music: Watch your virtual orchestra perform your compositions in real time, synchronizing the musicians' animations with your audio tracks.

  • Design Personalized Levels for Maestro VR: Create custom levels within Maestro VR. With an intuitive interface, drag and drop icons onto the lanes to design your own symphonic rhythm game.

  • Share and Enjoy Your Creations: Immerse yourself in a unique experience that combines musical creativity with the entertainment of video games. Share your concerts and levels with the community and enjoy creations from other players.

  • Ideal for Composers and Musicians: With Maestro VR - Level Editor, you can simulate a concert of your musical piece, creating a personalized symphony orchestra within virtual reality. It's an excellent tool for composers and musicians who wish to see and hear their works performed by a virtual orchestra.

Start creating, playing, and sharing with Maestro VR - Level Editor and take your passion for music to the next level!
detailed_description:
Maestro VR - Level Editor is the perfect addition to Maestro VR, allowing you to create and customize your own virtual symphony orchestra and design rhythmic levels within the game.

  • Create Your Virtual Symphony Orchestra: Edit each instrument track by track, assigning them audio files that will be placed in the 3D space corresponding to each musician. Mix your orchestra's audio to experience a unique musical journey. Each concert hall has its own reverberation, adding realism and depth to your performances.

  • Synchronize Animations with Your Music: Watch your virtual orchestra perform your compositions in real time, synchronizing the musicians' animations with your audio tracks.

  • Design Personalized Levels for Maestro VR: Create custom levels within Maestro VR. With an intuitive interface, drag and drop icons onto the lanes to design your own symphonic rhythm game.

  • Share and Enjoy Your Creations: Immerse yourself in a unique experience that combines musical creativity with the entertainment of video games. Share your concerts and levels with the community and enjoy creations from other players.

  • Ideal for Composers and Musicians: With Maestro VR - Level Editor, you can simulate a concert of your musical piece, creating a personalized symphony orchestra within virtual reality. It's an excellent tool for composers and musicians who wish to see and hear their works performed by a virtual orchestra.

Start creating, playing, and sharing with Maestro VR - Level Editor and take your passion for music to the next level!
name: Maestro VR - Level Editor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700K / AMD Ryzen 7 2700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 / AMD Radeon RX Vega 64

short_description: Maestro VR - Level Editor allows you to create and customize your own virtual symphony orchestra and design rhythmic levels within Maestro VR. Create, play, and take your passion for music to the next level!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Korean*, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support
